EnPassantTests
Tests if the ChessGame implementation can handle En Passant moves En Passant is a situational move in chess taken directly after your opponent has double moved a pawn If their pawn moves next to one of your pawns, so it passes where your pawn could have captured it, you may capture their pawn with your pawn as if they had only moved a single space.
